column5: Headed out with a buddy of mine today to hunt for some chrome there getting pretty scarse out here in the east now. Really had to work for this one Both of us  must have re tied 7 or 8 times today but all in all I  went 1 for 2 and he went 0/1. I landed this beauty on my new rod and float reel That was my first fish caught and landed on the new reel and rod and I was very impressed.     Same Fish
Nice report and great fish, I'd guess around 6lbs
Close she felt about 6.5lbs but I dunno didnt have a scale
At an echange rate of .858922 to 1... would be 6.87 lbs. American?
nice steel and that river looks prime... cliff...
Nice pics and Nice Fish!!! I think the best part of pictures that are posted are the scenery surrounding them.....Beauty thanks for sharing  Gerritt.
Nice trout, congrats on breaking in the new float setup...  Mike
WTG GNOTTY !!! Nice way to break in a new rod and reel......  Tight Lines.....
Beauty pics and fish, thanks for sharing.
